title: ‘Sequencers’ Are Blockchain’s Air Traffic Control. Here’s Why They’re Misunderstood
description: Leading rollup operators are criticized for using "centralized sequencers" to package transactions and pass them down to Ethereum, but the real risks may lie elsewhere.

title: Coinbase Singapore now requires counterparty’s personal information to process transactions
description:
Coinbase Singapore users must provide additional counterparty information when initiating cryptocurrency deposits or withdrawals from their accounts starting Sept. 5. The exchange said it introduced these measures in compliance with the Monetary Authority of Singapore (MAS) regulations on anti-money laundering and countering the financing of terrorism. According to its website, Coinbase Singapore users are required […]

The post Coinbase Singapore now requires counterparty’s personal information to process transactions appeared first on CryptoSlate.
